@WhiteHouse Covid-19 USA unofficial Wed 5/6
Cases 1,256,354 +19,085 up 1.5% 
Open Cases 976,979 (77.7%) down .3
Closed cases 279,375 (22%) up .8
Recovered 205,261 +5457 (16.3%) up .2
Deaths 74,114 +1864 (5.8%)  unchanged
closed cases Died 27% vs recover 73%

Significant new cases -.5% -6000
